name: Mr. Phonebreaker
description:
This is a hack of Mario Bros GBA Scratch Game.

Controls:

P1 Move & Jump: ↑ → ← Lift: ↓ 

P2 Move & Jump: W A D Lift: S

Pause: SPACE

--------------------

Modes: 

You can either choose Singleplayer, or local Multiplayer.

1. Classic (Beat waves of enemies and progress to the next phase)

2. Endless (No phases, enemies keep coming)

3. Onelife (One Life "No 1up's") (100 bonus point's per second alive)

4. Coin battle (Multiplayer only)

Flip enemies over by bumping the ground underneath them, then kick them off the stage. Corn Stealers take one hit to flip over. Denbis take two hits, Shells can be kicked around like a turtle shell to flip enemies in its path, and Flying Stealers jump and must be timed to flip.
